common.name: Name
common.form_invalid_alert: Please address the errors in your form to proceed
common.input_filed_invalid_helper_text: Must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).
common.quick_start_guide_message: Need help getting started? Follow our quick start guide.
common.input_text_area_invalid_helper_text: Valid characters include letters from Aa to Zz, numbers from 0 to 9, spaces, and line breaks.

srs.welcome_empty_state_body: Store and manage artifacts, like schemas and APIs, with Service Registry. To get started, create your Service Registry.
srs.unauthorized_empty_state_body: To set up a Service Registry, your account needs the appropriate access entitlements
srs.tab_sample_code_title_info: Below are example configuration snippets for accessing Service Registry from different runtimes.
srs.connection_title_info: Use this information to connect an application or tool to this service registry.
srs.service_registry_name_length_is_greater_: Service account name cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
srs.service_registry_desc_length_is_greater_: Service account description cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
srs.service_registry_description_length_is_g: Service account description cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
